Drinking in pregnancy can 
lead to long-term harm to 
your baby, with the more you 
drink the greater the risk.
Therefore, it is important to be 
aware that:
• Drinking heavily or ‘binge’ 
drinking (over 6 units 
in one session) in early 
pregnancy can be harmful 
to your baby and there is 
an increased risk of early 
miscarriage.

be unaware of their
